column5: Hey there, couldn't get on the site for about a month, clearly the only one with this issue... lol ...  anyways, wanted to make this report, had it made a while ago ....  http://blog.bulltron.ca  no pics on that .... most of the fish were pretty lame to take photo's of anyways  every time I go back there, the fishing is slightly worse than the time before, and the water was sooo low, even compared to about 5 months ago when i was there last at my cabin, by about a 1 or 2ft I would guess.
